origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'FinanceAPI.analyze_policy_impact', 'description': 'This function analyzes the impact of a specific policy on a given industry by fetching relevant policy files and industry financing data.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'policyType', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The type of policy to analyze, e.g., financial_support_cultural_industries.'}, {'name': 'industry', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The industry to analyze the impact on, e.g., cultural_creative.'}, {'name': 'dataSources', 'type': 'LIST', 'description': 'A list of data sources to fetch for analysis, e.g., policy_files, financing_data.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'analysisReport', 'description': 'A report detailing the impact of the policy on the industry.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 FinanceAPI.analyze_policy_impact, 它的参数输入如下: 'policyType'是'financial_support_cultural_industries', 'industry'是'cultural_creative', 'dataSources'是'policy_files'和'financing_data'.
